context: using n8n with Google Calendar or Calendly integration
description: Automate interview scheduling to eliminate back-and-forth emails. System automatically sends calendar invitations to shortlisted candidates, syncs with team calendars, sends confirmations, and updates Notion ATS. Part of Week 2 implementation.
dependencies: Google Calendar access OR Calendly account
success_criteria: Interview invitation automatically sent when candidate status changes to 'Interview Scheduled'
Calendar event created with video meeting link
Candidate receives professional invitation email with time slot options

inputs: Budget constraints (Calendly paid vs Google Calendar free)
outputs: Decision: Google Calendar (free, more control) OR Calendly (easier, professional)
Justification documented
steps.success_criteria: Clear decision made based on team needs

steps.name: Configure Google Calendar for interview slots (if Google Calendar chosen)
outputs: Shared calendar: HR Interviews

Video conferencing enabled (Google Meet)

steps.name: Setup Calendly scheduling page (if Calendly chosen)

outputs: Calendly event types created

Confirmation and reminder emails customized
Calendly webhook URL for n8n integration

steps.name: Build n8n workflow: Notion status change → Send interview invitation

Email template with Calendly link OR calendar invitation with time slots
Workflow activated
steps.success_criteria: Workflow triggers correctly, email sent, calendar event created, Notion updated

steps.name: Create professional interview invitation email template

inputs: Interview details: type, duration, what to prepare

Professional formatting with HTML
Clear call-to-action
Mobile-responsive design

steps.name: Configure calendar event creation with video meeting link

inputs: Video conferencing: Google Meet, Zoom, or Microsoft Teams link
outputs: Calendar event creation node configured
Automatic Google Meet link generation enabled
Event description includes interview instructions
Reminders set: 1 day before, 1 hour before

steps.name: Add confirmation handling and Notion update
inputs: Calendly confirmation webhook OR Google Calendar RSVP
Notion database ID and candidate page ID
outputs: Workflow extension: Candidate confirms → Update Notion 'Interview Date' field → Send confirmation to hiring manager
Status tracking in Notion
Notification to team

steps.name: Setup reminder automation for candidates and interviewers
inputs: Reminder timing: 24 hours before, 2 hours before
outputs: Scheduled reminder workflow: Check calendar daily → Send reminders for upcoming interviews
Candidate reminder: interview prep tips, video link, contact info
Interviewer reminder: candidate profile link (Notion), interview guide, talking points
steps.success_criteria: Reminders sent automatically at correct times, content helpful and actionable

steps.name: Test complete scheduling workflow
outputs: Interview invitation email received by test candidate
Candidate selects time slot (Calendly) OR receives calendar invite
Calendar event created for all attendees
Notion ATS updated with interview date
Reminders sent at correct times
All stakeholders notified

compliance_notes: GDPR: Candidate calendar data is personal information. Ensure consent before storing. Auto-delete interview calendar data 90 days after hire/reject decision. Provide opt-out option for automated reminders.

troubleshooting.issue: Notion trigger not firing when status changes
troubleshooting.solution: Use polling trigger (every 5 minutes) instead of webhook if webhook unreliable, or use Notion database change trigger
Re-authenticate Google OAuth connection, verify scopes include calendar.events write access

troubleshooting.issue: Calendly webhook not received by n8n
troubleshooting.solution: Verify n8n webhook URL is publicly accessible, check Calendly webhook logs for errors

troubleshooting.issue: Interview reminders sent to wrong candidates
troubleshooting.solution: Add filter to check interview date is in next 24 hours, use unique identifier to match candidates

troubleshooting.issue: Time zone confusion for international candidates
troubleshooting.solution: Always display time zones in emails, use candidate's local time zone in calendar invites, add timezone note in Notion

optimization_tips: Use Calendly routing forms to direct candidates to appropriate interview type
Create different Calendly event types for each interview stage (phone screen, technical, final)
Add buffer time between interviews to prevent interviewer fatigue
Use n8n sub-workflows for reusable interview scheduling logic
Implement round-robin assignment if multiple interviewers available
Track scheduling metrics: time-to-schedule, candidate dropout rate at scheduling step
future_enhancements: AI-powered optimal time suggestion based on candidate and interviewer availability
Automatic rescheduling workflow if candidate requests change
Integration with video interview platforms (HireVue, SparkHire) for recorded interviews
Candidate self-rescheduling link in reminder emails
Post-interview feedback reminder automation (send to interviewer 2 hours after interview)
